name: Joe LeBlanc
body:
### Career
Currently programming on a full-time basis, I am not currently seeking freelance or side-projects

### Profiles
[GitHub](https://github.com/jlleblanc)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/jlleblanc)

[LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=4873110)

### Authored


#### Lynda.com
[Up and Running with PHP: PEAR, PECL, and Composer](http://www.lynda.com/Composer-tutorials/Up-Running-PHP-PEAR-PECL-Composer/119001-2.html)

[Up and Running with Backbone.js](http://www.lynda.com/Backbonejs-tutorials/Up-Running-Backbonejs/120900-2.html)

[Up and Running with NoSQL Databases](http://www.lynda.com/NoSQL-tutorials/Up-Running-NoSQL-Databases/111598-2.html)

[Node.js First Look](http://www.lynda.com/Nodejs-tutorials/Nodejs-First-Look/101554-2.html)

[Joomla! 1.7: Programming and Packaging Extensions](http://www.lynda.com/Joomla-1-6-tutorials/Joomla-1-7-Programming-and-Packaging-Extensions/73654-2.html)

[Joomla! 1.5 Essential Training](http://www.lynda.com/Joomla-1-5-tutorials/essential-training/474-2.html)

#### Packt Publishing
[Learning Joomla! 1.5 Extension Development](http://www.packtpub.com/learning-joomla-15-extension-development/book)

### Contact
[Support for ALL Lynda.com videos](http://www.lynda.com/support/contact.aspx)

[Support for Learning Joomla 1.5 Extension Development](http://www.packtpub.com/support)

Do not email me directly for support on Lynda.com videos: please use the link above. For all other inquiries or just to say 'hi', email contact AT SYMBOL jlleblanc \[dot\] com.
